title: Wont we have any freshers party?

comments.body: No party, but we will soon be hosting something for freshers. A whole week dedicated to you guys. Keep an eye out.
Bruh u cant start without kcet guys comn manhh
Huh whatever happened to the secret assignment? We had a blast at part 3 but that was 4 years ago
It's the first year since COVID restrictions have kind of been completely pulled
